title: Insights for Investors Series: Avoiding LOI Mistakes in Healthcare Deals (Part 1)

media:group.media:title: Insights for Investors Series: Avoiding LOI Mistakes in Healthcare Deals (Part 1)
media:group.media:description:
Independent Sponsors: Healthcare Coalition - Aug. 18, 2022: 
Even though market volatility has made the investment landscape more challenging, healthcare private equity returns continue to outpace returns in other industries. Vital in the process of healthcare deal-making is the letter of intent (LOI).
In Part I of McGuireWoods' Independent Sponsor Healthcare Coalition’s “Insights for Investor Series,” McGuireWoods lawyers Geoff Cockrell and Alyssa Campbell  discuss common issues, LOI tips and traps, how to establish clear intentions, and what to consider when negotiating an LOI in the context of a healthcare transaction. To view a recording of the webinar, click on the button below. To learn more about the topic, feel free to contact our speakers.
Videos may include attorney advertising and aren’t legal advice/opinion. Prior successes ≠ future results.
